macro.name: ADDR
macro.description: IP address to connect to.

macro.name: PORT
macro.description: Modbus Port number of device. Defaults to 502

macro.name: MODELNO
macro.description: Moxa model number. 1210, 1240 or 1262.

macro.name: CHAN0NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 0, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN1NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 1, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN2NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 2, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN3NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 3, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN4NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 4, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN5NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 5, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN6NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 6, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN7NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 7, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN8NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 8, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN9NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 9, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN10NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 10, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN11NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 11, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN12NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 12, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN13NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 13, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN14NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 14, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN15NAME
macro.description: Name of channel 15, max 39 characters. Defaults to blank

macro.name: CHAN0HILIMIT
macro.description: Channel 0 High alarm value. Defaults to 10.0 for 1240 and 1100.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN1HILIMIT
macro.description: Channel 1 High alarm value. Defaults to 10.0 for 1240 and 1100.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN2HILIMIT
macro.description: Channel 2 High alarm value. Defaults to 10.0 for 1240 and 1100.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN3HILIMIT
macro.description: Channel 3 High alarm value. Defaults to 10.0 for 1240 and 1100.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN4HILIMIT
macro.description: Channel 4 High alarm value. Defaults to 10.0 for 1240 and 1100.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN5HILIMIT
macro.description: Channel 5 High alarm value. Defaults to 10.0 for 1240 and 1100.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN6HILIMIT
macro.description: Channel 6 High alarm value. Defaults to 10.0 for 1240 and 1100.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN7HILIMIT
macro.description: Channel 7 High alarm value. Defaults to 10.0 for 1240 and 1100.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN0LOWLIMIT
macro.description: Channel 0 Low alarm value. Defaults to 0.0 for 1240 and -180.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN1LOWLIMIT
macro.description: Channel 1 Low alarm value. Defaults to 0.0 for 1240 and -180.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN2LOWLIMIT
macro.description: Channel 2 Low alarm value. Defaults to 0.0 for 1240 and -180.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN3LOWLIMIT
macro.description: Channel 3 Low alarm value. Defaults to 0.0 for 1240 and -180.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN4LOWLIMIT
macro.description: Channel 4 Low alarm value. Defaults to 0.0 for 1240 and -180.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN5LOWLIMIT
macro.description: Channel 5 Low alarm value. Defaults to 0.0 for 1240 and -180.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN6LOWLIMIT
macro.description: Channel 6 Low alarm value. Defaults to 0.0 for 1240 and -180.0 for 1262.

macro.name: CHAN7LOWLIMIT
macro.description: Channel 7 Low alarm value. Defaults to 0.0 for 1240 and -180.0 for 1262.
